body.name: LJGG Microfiber Mops for Floor Cleaning, 18 Inch Baseboard Cleaner Mop Tool, Flat Floor Mop for Laminate Wooden Hard Floor Vinyl Tile, Bathroom Kitchen Mop with 4 Washable Reusable Microfiber Pads
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 15 hrs 7 mins
features: Microfiber Floor Mops: Durable microfiber floor mop floor cleaning that comes with 4 high-quality reusable washable microfiber mop pads. Microfiber mop attracts fine dust & hair effectively and absorbs water instantly, leaving your floor sparkling.

Adjustable Handle: Built with durable plastic and sturdy stainless steel handle, The hardwood floor mop comes with 4 pieces of durable and lightweight ergonomic Aluminum alloy pole to compose the mop handle, which can be adjusted from 29.5" to 52".

Professional floor cleaning mop pads: this dry/wet dust mop for hardwood floor cleaning can easily and safely handle all stubborn stains on most flat hard-surface floors and walls, such as hardwood, laminate, tile, wood, marble, stone, concrete, etc.

Flexible rotating 360 spin mop head: Features a 360-degree maneuverable swivel head that allows you to mop around the stairs, furniture, and table legs, it will be simple to clean all hard-to-reach areas of your house, ensuring your house is thoroughly cleaned.

Excellent Experience: LJGG is ideal for cleaning windows, shower glass doors, mirrors and vehicle glass. Get your hands on our Window Squeegee, and enjoy a time-saving, efficient cleaning experience. Please contact us at any time if you have problems, we will reply within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Microfiber Mop makes the tedious task of cleaning hardwood, laminate, tile, stone and concrete floors quick and easy. You can also use it to clean hardwood, laminate, tile and stone floors as quickly and efficiently as a professional cleaner! The microfiber mop makes your life easier and gets your chores done in minutes. Material: Aluminum, ABS, Foam Mop frame size (L x W x Th): 45 cm x 9 cm x 0.3 cm (18 inches x 4 inches x 0.1 inches) Mop Pad Size (L x W): 45 cm x 11 cm (18 in. x 4 in. x 0.1 in.) machine washable and quick dry Inside the box 1 x Mop 1 x Stain brush 4 x Microfiber Wet & Dry Pads (Gray)

360° Swivel Function This lightweight microfiber mop is easy to use and moves easily across the floor. With a 360° swivel feature, lightweight aluminum handle, angled frame and a mop pad that reaches into corners, this mop makes cleaning your floors easy! Long Handle The handle is long up to 135 cm. No need to bend over, get rid of back pain, easily clean the wall and ceiling. Keep the house clean and bright, keep yourself in a good mood the whole day! Easy Mopping! mops make mopping quick and easy! You don't need a bucket or any chemical cleaners. Simply wet the mop pad in the sink, wring it out, stick it to the frame, and start mopping. When the mop pad gets dirty, simply rinse, wring, and repeat.

Please feel free to let us know if you encounter any problems during use. You can use it as a dry mop or a wet mop. Perfect for everyday household cleaning needs, this mop removes a variety of stains such as floor dirt, water stains, pet hair, shoe prints, and wall dust. Suitable for use on a variety of surface areas including wood, tile, marble, walls, glass windows and hardwood floors. Meets the cleaning needs of a variety of home environments: living rooms, kitchens, dining rooms, bathrooms, garages, warehouses, offices and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Best mop ever! Lightweight yet sturdy. Gets in corners and tough to reach spots. I use it as both a broom and mop. What A deal!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Esta muy cómodo de usar
reviews.reviewText: Gira y puedes limpiar bien las esquinas .debajo de los muebles

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great on my brand new floor love it , also lightweight and very sturdy, thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: So far, this is a great item (I have only mopped twice since I got it)....The pads attach easily, and the best part is they are easy to detach and throw in the washer. I have only used one pad, but they seem very sturdy. The handle is stronger than a swiffer so if you need to scrub, you can scrub.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy on the back. Easy to wash out
reviews.reviewText: Love this product. I clean homes and my clients all like this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've had mixed feelings about the "assemble your broomstick" type items, but this one is a winner!Tip: Use plumbers tape (or maybe thin masking tape) on the threads to get the segments to really stay locked and not come loose.At $15, this thing is a steal. Plus you can break it down for storage and put in a bag, that's pretty awesome.It works great, and the extra wide style is the best. It's super light and works wet or dry and is a joy to use on stuff that is not a joy to deal with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I should have bought this sooner! This reusable mop works great for both wet and dry surfaces. Comes with 4 reusable microfiber pads that are easy to wash. easy to buy replacements. They connect by Velcro and feel secure if you are getting replacement pads, make sure that they are 18 inch ones. As you can see from the second picture they also have a clip on them so you can essentially put a rag and clip the rag on as well. The handle was strong and long so I was able to reach spots without having to bend over too much to clean wet. I just use a spray bottle full of diluted Lysol multipurpose cleaner, spray on the floor and then use the mop simple as that. I'm very happy with this purchase. Good value for the money would definitely recommend. Happy cleaning.
